summary: Completed Phase 4 Polish frontend testing for EKA-AI. All key features working: Login dark theme, ChatsPage with date grouping/search, Job card rows clickable navigating to detail page, and 9-state stepper. Note: Provided test credentials (test@test.com/password123) are invalid - use testuser@test.com/test123456 instead.
passed_tests: Login Page: Dark theme with #0D0D0D background color
Login Page: Google auth button visible and functional
Login Page: Email auth flow works with password reveal
Login Page: Typing animation on tagline works
Login Page: Feature video carousel on right side
Login Page: Mobile responsive with feature showcase
Dashboard: Successfully redirected after login
Dashboard: StatCards visible with trend indicators (+3 today, +2 vs yesterday, +12% vs last month)
Dashboard: Revenue Trend and Job Status charts visible
ChatsPage: Dark theme with proper styling
ChatsPage: Date grouping works (TODAY, YESTERDAY, PREVIOUS 7 DAYS, PREVIOUS 30 DAYS, OLDER)
ChatsPage: Search input filters chats correctly
ChatsPage: New Chat button visible and functional
ChatsPage: 7 chat items with previews visible
JobCardsPage: Stats cards (Total Jobs, Active Jobs, Awaiting Approval, In PDI)
JobCardsPage: Job cards table loads with 4 rows
JobCardsPage: Row clickability - clicking row navigates to detail page
JobCardDetailPage: Successfully displays job card information
JobCardDetailPage: 9-state stepper visible (Created, Context, Diagnosed, Estimated, Approval, In Progress, PDI, Invoiced, Closed)
JobCardDetailPage: Vehicle Information section
JobCardDetailPage: Customer Information section
JobCardDetailPage: Quick Actions (Start AI Diagnosis, Generate Invoice, Download Report)
JobCardDetailPage: Activity Timeline visible
JobCardDetailPage: Back button works
action_items: IMPORTANT: Update test credentials in documentation - test@test.com/password123 returns 'Invalid credentials'. Working credentials are testuser@test.com/test123456
critical_code_review_comments: Good: All Phase 4 Polish features implemented correctly
Good: Dark theme consistent across Login, Chats, and Dashboard
Good: ChatsPage date grouping uses proper date calculation logic
Good: Job card table rows have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Good: 9-state stepper matches lifecycle states from types.ts
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 4 Polish features all working. Login at '/', dashboard at '/app/dashboard', chats at '/chats', job cards at '/app/job-cards'. Job card detail at '/app/job-cards/:id'. Test user: testuser@test.com / test123456. ChatsPage uses mock data for chat history grouped by date.

chats_page.search: Working - filters by title and preview
